data.title: How can you not have separate fryers
data.text: I came in to eat while in town for some personal business and I came out to eat here with a couple friends.  I have allergies to a few things.  In a franchised restaurant how can you not have a 3 well fryer and how can you not adhere to the separation of foods I.e. Seafood in one fryer chicken in another and veggies in the last one.   It's not that hard to be conscious about what fryer you put food in in a franchised restaurant

data.title: Fantastic service and food
data.text: I had a new burger with an egg  hash browns, bacon, cheese, and burger.  Wow pretty dam good.  I will definitely do again.

data.title: Smaller Applebee's
data.text: This location seems smaller than most Applebee's restaurants. I had the 4 cheese Mac and cheese with honey pepper chicken tenders . This dish had some spice and was very good. Our server was prompt.

data.title: Lunch
data.text: We stopped in for lunch while in Rochester, about 2:30 in the afternoon. We were escorted to a booth right away, the table had not been washed, I pointed it out and the young man apologized and wiped it off for us. Our waitress was quite busy with a number of tables, she got to us in a few minutes, brought our drinks and took our orders. Our meals were served in about 15 minutes, they were delicious! Our waitress was very busy, but did a great job, a manager also stopped by our table and asked how things were. When in the area, we will visit there again!

data.title: Never again.  Terrible service!
data.text: We went here on Father's Day with a few other couples and kids.  The service was terrible.  The waitress could not seem to handle simple drink orders.  My husband waited over 30 minutes for a tap beer.  Meanwhile, everyone else had theirs.  We had to ask for it twice.  How hard is it for the bartender to pour a tap beer?  Finally the manager came over and said he would not be charged for it?  That was the very LEAST they could have done.  The food was mediocre at best.  I asked for a glass of wine and of course they game me (and charged me) for the larger size.  Overpriced food and terrible service.  Would never go back.  Not to mention that the bartender was completely smart mouthed and kept interrupting into our conversations.

data.title: Amazing service
data.text: Our waitress was amazing!  I know, it's Applebee's; but, great service is great service and our waitress (Amy) was great.  Amy made recommendations, and never let our glass get empty.  Oh, and the food was really good too.

data.title: HuHots Long Line Sent us across to Applebees
data.text: We came to eat at Huhot but the line was awfully long, and the wait time was estimated 30-45 minutes just to get seated, so we went across the way to Applebees, they were really pretty busy, but we got seated fairly fast but there were only two of us. We were seated by the mall window so we watched many many many groups try to go to Huhot to come across to Applebees, they were really busy, but our waitress was a rock star, she stayed on top of our refills, and making sure we were doing good, she was there when needed but not overbearing, she was fun, and talkative, wish I remembered her name because she deserves the attention!! The food was warm and good!! Would defiantly come back, although we were looking for something different, I was glad that Huhot was too busy and we got such amazing service!!

data.title: Decent Meal
data.text: Food was good. My daughters was ok. Service was good! The restaurant was clean and maintained. I would recommend for a nice lunch or dinner.

data.title: Average
data.text: The place was nice, food, service as well! We love their asian style chicken wings and steak too. Last time we went out together with my best friend we enjoyed the food and everything.

data.title: yum
data.text: I come here when I am doctoring at Mayo.  I feel ok about being alone.  The food is always great, service is very good. I like sitting by the windows.  Pretty clean. Fast. Great location but parking stinks.

data.title: Surprise on the bill
data.text: Applebees was our second choice in Apache Mall, but since we could NOT find the restaurant we were looking for we went there.  The host promptly seated us.  There was a IPAD at the table with a trivia game on it.  I started playing it while we waited for our waitress to show up.  She did and we ordered.  Food was slow getting to us and the place was NOT very busy.  Food was ok nothing spectacular but ok.  I was surprised when the bill showed up I was charged for the games I played.  Yet the game never informed me it would cost money to play.  I told our waitress about this and she said she had complained to Management about this to no avail.  I would go to another place if you have a choice and if DON'T touch the IPAD!!!!!

data.title: crappy service
data.text:
this was today -march the 29th- i was there with my wife , the waitress  gave us a table  got us something to drink then she said... "you need a couple more minutes?" I Said "yes please " then 30 minutes after that when she never came back we decided to leave.

we look this bunch of employees in a corner laughing, lookin their phones, some others having a good time in the kitchen then i look the waitress there outside the kitchen havin a pretty funny conversation with another waitress ...she look to my table for a second the keep talkin with her friend.

im not comin back to this one and I be sure to tell every person i know to never stop by this place...poor, nasty, disrepectful service .

data.title: Couldn't eat there
data.text: They are very busy on Saturday and there was waiting line, visible from outside, but we decided to go there anyway. We went in and the smell just pushed me back. Smell like cold burned oil and cold food. The place was not cleaned for a while or poorly ventilated or both. We just got out.

data.title: Quick lunch during basketball tournament.
data.text: One of the better Applebee's we have been to in a while.  Seated promptly, served beverages, and order taken immediately.    Staff was friendly.  Prompt service.  Clean restaurant.

data.title: Loud restaurant
data.text: The food was standard for an Applebee's but we had to ask 3 times for the overhead music to be turned down as we almost had to yell to talk among ourselves.  Our waitress also had to ve reminded about things on our order.  I won't be back.

data.title: Lunch
data.text: Sunday the 23rd lunch waited a half hour for the food when it was when it came it was cold told the waitress nothing was done about it very poor service

data.title: Excellent food for excellent price!
data.text: Great burgers and fries. Cheap and delicious on Mondays. Perfect to uplift the dreary Monday blues. Friendly and fast service. Manger came around and checked on us. Great value in LANCASTER, OHIO!!! Family friendly too

data.title: Monday night burgers
data.text: The burgers were prepared and cooked perfect. No complaints here. The Applebee's in Miramar beach is usually awesome. I would recommend this Monday night special to a friend

data.title: Skip it
data.text: We ate at Applebee for lunch on Saturday 8/29/15. When being seated we asked for a table by the window or a high top table around the bar and were told that they didn't have enough wait staff to open those areas. I ordered their Triple hog dare you sandwiches.   It was disgusting. Just a greasy mess. The ham was some processed slime pass off as meat, and there was maybe 3 piece of pulled pork. Just gross. My sandwich came with maybe 15 warm fries.  My husband got a burger which was overcooked.   His onion rings were the kind you buy at the grocery store and cook I  the over, however they tasted better than my French fries. The only good thing to say is the strawberry daquari I ordered was good. Overpriced but good. Most likely not eat there again.

data.title: 5 Stars All The Way!
data.text:
This is what The American Dream and APPLEBEE'S  is all about--great food great great service great atmosphere!  BUILD IT AND DO IT AND THEY WILL COME!  Thanks Rochester Applebee's and here's the song I wrote and YOU ARE WHAT MEAN WHEN I WROTE THIS SONG: We Believe In America The Dream --TG  Songwriter/Performer/Educator
 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8SkA3p0ty00
